DOC.brief_title: Canola Oil Multi-center Intervention Trial II
DOC.criteria: waist circumference ≥94 cm men ≥80 cm woman Elevated triglyceride ≥150 mg/dL ≤ 400 mg/dL Reduced HDL < 40 mg/dL men < 50 mg/dL woman Fasting glucose ≥ 100 mg/dl ≤ 126 mg/dL Elevated blood pressure systolic ≥130 and/or diastolic ≥85 mm HG [ Unmedicated participant upper limit Stage 1 Hypertension : systolic < 160 and/or diastolic < 100 mm HG participant must free end stage/target organ disease symptom ] [ BP medicate participant : acceptable long individual meet specify blood pressure range < 140/90 mmHg , stable least 6 month ] Individuals thyroid** , kidney , liver disease [ Individuals thyroid disease whose blood value within normal limit stable ( medication ) past 6 month consider eligible ] Individuals diabetes mellitus Smokers Individuals consume > 14 alcoholic beverage per week Individuals take lipid lower medication ( ex : cholestyramine , colestipol , niacin , cloribrate , gemfibrozil , probucol , HMG CoA reductase inhibitor ) least last 3 month Pregnancy lactation
